question.title: Unable to get mutable Windows environment variable map - gradle test
question.body:
I am trying to run gradle on intellij IDEA with the command ./gradlew run and I receive this error:

 FAILURE: Build failed with an exception.

* What went wrong:
Unable to get mutable Windows environment variable map

The project I pulled from a github repo is with gradle 4.3 and java 1.8 This is the project I am working on: OpenClassrooms project

I have found another question here with the same problem, they suggested to change the jdk/gradle version according to the compatibility matrix. So I installed java 9 which is compatible with gradle 4.3 but I still have the same problem.
